item.title: U.S. seizes oil tanker suspected of carrying embargoed Venezuelan oil in Caribbean
item.description: The U.S. seized an oil tanker suspected of carrying embargoed oil from Venezuela in a predawn mission.

item.title: Trump says he canceled additional attacks on Venezuela, pointing to prisoner release
item.description: President Trump says he canceled a "second wave of attacks" on Venezuela because he sees progress in Caracas under the interim government.
